name: HeroBlast
description:
hey, i made a game in five hours and its pretty ok
made for bored people by bored people

CONTROLS

Q: pull out sword
E: pull out gun
WASD: movement
MOUSE: aiming/firing 

story: your a stupid little idiot boy playing with little tommy in the sand box and a big evil red portal lets out the dark lord and his minions. the local hero uses his power suit to defeat the dark lord but dies easily. you pick up the power suit of the crispy corpes and you shoot his minions.
